title: You need help you little bitch?

fields.name: General Commands:
fields.value:
!help - displays this message
!example - displays an example embedded message; Not implemented yet lmao get fucked

fields.name: Editing Commands
fields.value:
!new - start new embedded message
!preview - view a preview of the message
!add [attribute] [value]- adds/updates attribute to the current msg  !remove [attribute] - removes attribute from the current msg
!channels - lists the channels and ids you can publish the current message to
!publish [channel-id] - publishes the currently loaded message to the chosen channel-id

fields.name: Template Commands
fields.value:
!templates - shows the saved embedded messages with their name
!load [name]- loads a saved embedded message as the current message
!save [name]- saves the embedded message on the server, for future use
  Note: If you use a name that already exists, this will overwrite it
!delete [name]- deletes a saved embedded message from the server

fields.name: Single Attributes
fields.value:
title - text 
color - hex
description - text
title-url - url
type - text 
  Possible values for type: rich, image, video, gifv, article, link

fields.name: Grouped Attributes
fields.value:
author-[name/url/icon_url] - text, url, url
fields-[name/value/inline] - text, text, True/False; Not implemented yet srry
footer-[text/icon_url] - text, url 
image-[url/proxy_url/width/height] - url, url, number
thumbnail-[url/proxy_url/width/height] - url, url, number, number
video-[url/width/height] - url, number, number

fields.name: Adding Examples
fields.value:
title - text
	!add title This is All Going into the Title
  color - hex ex: 0xff00bb or 0xFF00BB
	!add color 0xff00bb
	!add color 0xFF00BB
  footer-[text/icon_url] - text, url
	!add footer-text [your_text_here] 
	!add footer-icon_url [your_url_here]

fields.name: Things I'm working on
fields.value:
!example to print an example
!add fields-[name/value/inline] for adding fields to messages
!help [general/template/attributes/examples] to print a smaller help box
